channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: FBI ousts reinstated whistleblower over unauthorized media talks, ‘poor judgment’
item.description: FBI agent and COVID-era whistleblower Steve Friend was fired for "unprofessional conduct" just months after being reinstated by the Trump administrati...

item.title: At least 2 killed and 8 injured hurt in shooting at Brown University with suspect still at large
item.description: The suspect was a male who was dressed in black and last seen leaving the building, said Timothy O’Hara, Deputy Chief of Police.

item.title: The Florida Highwaymen: Outsider Art, Tourism, and American Landscape
item.description: The fascinating story of black artists whose flamboyant colors, ocean waves, and swaying palms defined Florida for a generation of tourists.

item.title: Danish intelligence report warns of U.S. economic leverage and military threat under Trump
item.description: “China and Russia, together with other like-minded states, are seeking to reduce Western–and particularly US–global influence," the report said.

item.title: Trump vows 'very serious retaliation' against ISIS after deadly Syrian ambush kills US soldiers
item.description: President Donald Trump vows "very serious retaliation" after an ISIS gunman killed two U.S. Army soldiers and an interpreter in a Syrian ambush, leavi...

item.title: How Euthanasia Gained a Foothold in Hospice Care
item.description: The concept of hospice was originally sold to the public as a better way to treat patients with terminal disease. The mission has been hijacked.

item.title: Some Native Americans draw shocked response over contract to design immigration detention centers

item.title: Elon Musk blasts Newsom’s office, says his son is battling mental illness due to ‘evil woke mind virus’
item.description: Elon Musk and California Gov. Gavin Newsom clashed on social media over transgender rights and Musk's estranged daughter in a heated public exchange.

item.title: Maduro trapped with few retaliation options after Trump administration seizes Venezuelan oil tanker
item.description: The Trump administration seized an Venezuela oil tanker, leaving the Maduro regime with few retaliation options that wouldn't harm its own cash-starve...

item.title: Big 12 in advanced talks for deal with RedBird-backed fund
item.description: The partnership would offer the 16 member universities a line of credit of roughly $30 million each and is close to being finalized.

item.title: Appeals court allows Planned Parenthood defunding in 'huge' win for Trump administration
item.description: Score one for the Trump administration in its bid to cut off federal funding to Planned Parenthood.

item.title: U.S., Mexico strike deal to settle Rio Grande water dispute

item.title: Microsoft AI boss Suleyman opens up about his peers and calls Elon Musk a ‘bulldozer’ with ‘superhuman capabilities to bend reality to his will’
item.description: "And somehow he sort of mostly manages to pull off what appears to be impossible."

item.title: The Complicated Legacy of Frank Gehry’s Work
item.description: The legendary architect, who died last week, was an artist of self-expression.

item.title: The Mind-Boggling Saga of Kilmar Abrego Garcia
item.description: This seems to have been epic government incompetence.

item.title: Sen. Ron Johnson Asks DOJ To Investigate Judge Accused Of Misconduct In Trump Lawyers’ Trial
item.description: A judge with a 'grudge' against one of the defendants allegedly ghostwrote Wisconsin Judge John Hyland's August order denying a dismissal motion.

item.title: ADF: Employees Can’t Be Forced To Lie About Pronouns At Work
item.description: Employees don't have to insist on calling people by pronouns they don’t like. But they don’t have to say something they know is not true.

item.title: If Time Magazine Weren’t So Corrupt, It Would Have Made Charlie Kirk Person Of The Year
item.description: TIME could have used the credibility that choosing him would have helped restore.
